title: Starting a Ramadan Food Project
content:
for the last two years during ramadan, i had nothing to eat for iftar or suhur. i know what it feels like to break your fast with nothing, or to wake up for suhur with an empty stomach.

no one should have to go through that.

why this matters

ramadan is supposed to be a time of community and reflection. but when you're alone and have no food, it becomes something else entirely. you're just trying to survive until maghrib.

i spent those nights wondering if anyone else was going through the same thing. turns out, a lot of people are.

what we're doing

i'm starting an organization to feed people during ramadan. simple as that.

the plan is to provide iftar and suhur meals to anyone who needs them. no questions asked. no forms to fill out. just food when you need it.

we're starting small, but the goal is to make sure no one in our community goes hungry during ramadan.

how to donate

palmpay: 8120997879

account name: Olajide Al-ameen

every donation goes directly toward buying food and getting it to people who need it.

transparency

every single donation we receive and every expense we make will be posted on this website. you'll see exactly where your money goes.

view the full donations and expenses tracker

no hidden costs. no overhead. just food for people who need it.

if you know someone who might need meals during ramadan, let them know we're here. reach out on x.

moving forward

this is just the beginning. once we get through this ramadan, the goal is to keep going and expand to help more people year-round.

but for now, let's focus on making sure no one has to break their fast alone with nothing to eat.
excerpt: starting an organization to feed people during ramadan. no one should have to go through what i went through.
